nl.esciencecenter.octopus.adaptors.gridengine

Class GridEngineSchedulerConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.esciencecenter.octopus.adaptors.gridengine.SchedulerConnection
      • nl.esciencecenter.octopus.adaptors.gridengine.GridEngineSchedulerConnection

  • public class GridEngineSchedulerConnection
extends SchedulerConnection
    Interface to the GridEngine command line tools. Will run commands to submit/list/cancel jobs and get the status of queues.
    Author:
    Niels Drost
